item.title: 三家中东财富基金接近 1 万亿美元大关
item.description: 石油资源丰富的中东即将成为唯一一个拥有三万亿美元财富基金的地区。【原文：The oil-rich Middle East is close to becoming the only region with three trillion-dollar wealth funds.】

item.title: 流入符合指数条件的印度债券的资金将达到 100 亿美元
item.description: 在印度被摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）纳入其新兴市场债务指数之前，流入印度主权债券市场的外资正接近 100 亿美元大关。【原文：Foreign inflows into India’s sovereign bond market are closing in on the $10 billion mark ahead of the country’s inclusion in the JPMorgan Chase & Co’s emerging markets debt index.】

item.description: 总部位于阿布扎比的 Lunate Capital 有限公司与摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi-based Lunate Capital Limited has partnered with JPMorgan Chase & Co. to build the first exchange-traded fund tracking the performance of bonds in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称印度经济与 2000 年代的繁荣相似
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的经济学家认为，投资已成为印度经济蓬勃发展的主要推动力，并补充说，印度目前的经济扩张类似于 2000 年代中期，当时的平均增长率超过 8%。【原文：Investment has become a major driver of India’s booming economy, according to economists at Morgan Stanley, adding that the country’s current expansion resembles that of the mid-2000s when growth averaged more than 8%.】

item.title: 全球基金在日本央行会议前对增持日本银行股持谨慎态度
item.description: 包括野村资产管理公司（Nomura Asset Management Co.）和摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）在内的全球投资者对在其投资组合中增加更多日本银行股票持谨慎态度，即使这些股票的盈利能力有望因日本央行最早于下周加息而得到改善。【原文：Global investors including Nomura Asset Management Co. and JPMorgan Asset Management are cautious about adding more Japanese bank stocks to their portfolios, even as their profitability is expected to improve on a widely-expected rate hike by the nation’s central bank as early as next week.】

item.title: 塔斯社称俄罗斯梁赞炼油厂遭无人机袭击后起火
item.description: 据国有塔斯社周三报道，俄罗斯莫斯科东南部梁赞地区的一家炼油厂在可能遭到无人机袭击后起火。【原文：An oil refinery in Russia’s Ryazan region southeast of Moscow is on fire after a possible drone attack, state-owned Tass news agency reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 最新的市场喧嚣夸大了普通人的痛苦
item.description:
通胀数据良好，足以让 S&P 500 指数再创历史新高。这感觉与美国家庭相比简直是天壤之别。【原文：

The inflation numbers were benign enough for the S&P 500 to set another all-time high. That feels a world away from US households.

item.title: 芝士豆是食品的未来
item.description:
消费品公司必须进行创新，以保持欧洲买家的兴趣，因为他们不能再指望通胀来提高销售额。【原文：

Consumer companies must innovate to keep European buyer interest, as they can no longer count on inflation to boost the top line.

】

item.title: 操纵 Libor 的海报男孩为证明清白打响最后一枪
item.description: 汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）成为操纵伦敦银行同业拆借利率（Libor）丑闻的代言人已将近十年，他还有最后一次机会来洗清自己的罪名。【原文：Almost a decade since he became the face of the Libor rigging scandal, Tom Hayes has one final shot at clearing his name.】

item.title: 西格纳调查显示欧洲央行打击了 1 万亿欧元的房地产贷款
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的工作人员对此表示担忧。在盘问了半打以上的德国和奥地利银行去年向地产大亨雷内-本科的 230 亿欧元（250 亿美元）帝国提供贷款的情况后，他们担心其贷款人可能正在承受他们尚未认识到的损失。【原文：European Central Bank staff were concerned. After grilling more than half a dozen German and Austrian banks about their loans to property tycoon Rene Benko’s €23 billion ($25 billion) empire last year, they came away worried its lenders could be sitting on losses that they had yet to recognize.】

item.title: 报告显示，2023 年全球红利将达到创纪录的 16.6 亿美元
item.description: 根据基金管理公司 Janus Henderson Group Plc 的报告，去年全球红利达到创纪录的 1.66 万亿美元，该公司预计 2024 年将再创历史新高。【原文：Global dividends hit a record $1.66 trillion last year, according to a report by fund manager Janus Henderson Group Plc, which expects another all-time high in 2024.】

item.title: 国泰航空2023年营业利润创19亿美元新高
item.description: 国泰航空公司实现了有史以来最高的年度营业利润，终于摆脱了大流行病带来的复苏乏力局面，因为强劲的旅游需求推高了机票价格，而成本却得到了控制。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. delivered its highest annual operating profit on record, finally shaking off its sluggish pandemic recovery as strong demand for travel pushed up ticket prices, while costs were contained.】

item.title: 中国最大 ETF 因购买国家队而达到 280 亿美元规模
item.description: 最近，为增强市场信心，国家基金大举买入中国股票，使中国最大的在岸证券交易所交易基金的价值达到创纪录的 2,000 亿元人民币（280 亿美元）。【原文：Recent state-fund buying of Chinese equities in a bid to bolster market confidence has helped lift the value of the nation’s largest onshore stock exchange-traded fund to a record of 200 billion yuan ($28 billion).】

item.title: 阿特拉斯航空公司即将决定新喷气机以满足日益增长的货运需求
item.description: 全球最大的航空货运运营商之一阿特拉斯航空全球控股公司（Atlas Air Worldwide Holdings Inc.【原文：Atlas Air Worldwide Holdings Inc., one of the world’s largest air cargo operators, plans to decide on orders for several new freighter jets as it sees “significant opportunity” to grow, Chief Executive Officer Michael Steen said.】

item.title: 铁矿石因中国需求担忧而暴跌后将面临 100 美元的考验
item.description: 铁矿石继续下跌，逼近七个月低点，接近每吨 100 美元的水平，这可能会开始挤出一些高成本生产。【原文：Iron ore resumed its decline, closing in on a seven-month low and nearing the $100-a-ton level that might start to push out some high-cost production.】

item.title: 韩国接近延长在岸韩元交易时间
item.description: 在韩国当局准备延长韩元交易时段之际，韩国将再次对韩元盘后交易进行测试。【原文：South Korea will undertake another test of after-hours trading of the won as authorities prepare to extend the currency’s trading session.】

item.title: 碧桂园首次未能支付元债券票息
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. missed a coupon payment on a yuan bond for the first time, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to the woes of the Chinese developer that is now facing a lawsuit seeking its liquidation offshore.】

item.title: 垃圾债券熊不相信 "这次不一样 "的口号
item.description: 2024 年，几乎所有地方的垃圾债券都跑赢了风险较低的债务，但 Vontobel Holding AG 公司的一位策略师表示，他将避开这一资产类别。【原文：Junk bonds are beating less risky debt almost everywhere in 2024, but a Vontobel Holding AG strategist says he’s steering clear of the asset class.】

item.title: 蓝湾最大的宏观赌注是做空日本政府债券
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）将抛售日本政府债券作为首要赌注，因为预计日本央行可能在下周加息。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management has made selling Japanese government bonds a top wager on expectations the central bank is likely to raise interest rates next week.】

item.title: HQ Capital 聘请 Ardian 的 Michael Hu 负责亚洲业务拓展
item.description: HQ Capital 是一家专注于中小型市场投资的欧洲私募股权公司，该公司聘请了 Ardian SAS 的前高管 Michael Hu 担任亚洲区主管，并在新加坡开设了新的办事处，以发掘该地区的财富。【原文：HQ Capital, an European private equity firm focusing on small to mid-market investment, hired former Ardian SAS executive Michael Hu as head of Asia and opened a new office in Singapore as it seeks to tap wealth in the region.】

item.title: 在监管机构的严格审查下，流入印度衍生品市场的外资激增
item.description: 尽管监管机构加大了对冲基金和富人匿名投资的难度，但通过一种不为人知的离岸衍生工具流入印度的外国资金仍在增加。【原文：Foreign fund flows into India through an obscure offshore derivative are rising even as regulators make it harder for hedge funds and wealthy individuals to invest anonymously.】

item.title: 印度估值上升促使外国公司出售控股权
item.description: 一些外国公司正在减持其在印度的业务，利用印度股票市场的繁荣来筹集现金。【原文：Some foreign companies are paring stakes in their Indian businesses, taking advantage of the nation’s booming equity market to raise cash.】

item.title: 日本央行将如何处理其 4,750 亿美元的 ETF 储备？
item.description: 日本央行拥有约 70 万亿日元（约合 4750 亿美元）的交易所交易基金，这是其数十年来通过向股票市场投入资金来帮助战胜通货紧缩的运动的遗产。随着物价上涨波及整个经济，日本央行将提高利率，股票投资者面临的一个关键问题是，决策者计划如何处理这笔巨额资金，以及何时处理。减少资金将有助于央行将其政策中最非正统的部分正常化。【原文：The Bank of Japan owns around ¥70 trillion ($475 billion) of the country’s exchange-traded funds, a legacy of its decades-long campaign to help defeat deflation by pouring money into the equity market. With the BOJ set to raise interest rates as higher prices ripple through the economy, a key question for stock investors is what policymakers plan to do with this enormous pile of funds, and when. Reducing it would help the central bank normalize one of the most unorthodox parts of its policy regi】

item.title: 减税后香港公寓供应过剩将导致房价下跌
item.description: 自上个月政府取消额外的房产税以来，香港的房屋销售已经恢复了活力。供应过剩意味着房价反弹可能需要更长的时间。【原文：Hong Kong’s home sales have roared back to life since the government scrapped extra property taxes last month. A supply glut means a rebound in prices is likely to take much longer.】

item.title: 锂矿开采商 Liontown 赢得澳大利亚项目融资
item.description: 澳大利亚狮城资源有限公司（Liontown Resources Ltd.）已同意获得 5.5 亿澳元（3.64 亿美元）的贷款，这将使其关键的凯瑟琳谷锂项目能够在今年投产，这对这家初级矿商来说是一条生命线。【原文：Australia’s Liontown Resources Ltd. has agreed to a A$550 million ($364 million) loan that will enable it to get its key Kathleen Valley lithium project into production this year, a lifeline for the junior miner.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国和印度在通胀困境中搏斗。波音公司的困境波及整个航空业。股市反弹遭遇质疑。TikTok 寻找计划。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The US and India wrestle with sticky inflation. Boeing’s woes reverberate across the airline industry. Stock rally meets with skepticism. TikTok looks for a plan. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存下降，石油价格攀升
item.description: 由于一份行业报告指出美国原油库存减少，抵消了欧佩克减产计划的摇摆不定，石油价格在连续四天下跌后上扬。【原文：Oil advanced after four days of losses as an industry report pointed to shrinking US crude stockpiles, offsetting wavering OPEC cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡看到宏观不确定性对房地产行业的影响：新加坡通讯社
item.description: 新加坡一位部长警告说，经济的不确定性将拖累该国的房地产业，因为这个城市国家的房屋销售显示出需求疲软。【原文：A Singapore minister cautioned that economic uncertainties will weigh on the country’s real estate industry, as home sales in the city-state show flagging demand.】

item.title: 与中国相关的损失之后，韩国将审查风险金融产品
item.description: 韩国计划审查潜在高风险投资产品的销售情况，因为一项调查发现，银行向散户投资者误售了与中国挂钩的结构性产品，而这些散户投资者正面临着 40 多亿美元的损失。【原文：South Korea plans to review the sale of potentially high-risk investments after a probe found that banks missold China-linked structured products to retail investors who are facing more than $4 billion in losses.】
